snippet: An association of American professors with almost 5,000 members has become the largest academic group in the country to support a push to isolate Israel over its treatment of Palestinians.
lead_paragraph: An association of American professors with almost 5,000 members has become the largest academic group in the country to support a push to isolate Israel over its treatment of Palestinians.
abstract: American Studies Assn, organization of college professors, announces boycott of Israeli academic institutions to protest Israel's treatment of Palestinians; move signals that a movement to isolate and pressure Israel that is gaining ground in Europe has begun to make strides in United States.

headline.main: Boycott by Academic Group Is a Symbolic Sting to Israel
headline.print_headline: Boycott by Academic Group Is a Symbolic Sting to Israel

byline.contributor: Richard Pérez-Peña reported from New York, and Jodi Rudoren from Jerusalem.
byline.original: By RICHARD PÉREZ-PEÑA and JODI RUDOREN
